UserProfile.title: UserProfile
UserProfile.description: Represents a user's profile information, excluding authentication details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the UserProfile entity.

displayName.description: The public display name of the user.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the user profile was last updated.

Novel.title: Novel
Novel.description: Represents a literary novel, including its metadata and content details.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Novel entity (format: author_title).

authorName.description: The name of the novel's author.

description.description: A brief synopsis or summary of the novel.

coverImageUrl.description: URL to the novel's cover image.

totalChapters.description: The total number of chapters in the novel.

publicationDate.description: The date when the novel was first published.

genres.description: A list of genres associated with the novel.

language.description: The primary language of the novel (e.g., 'en', 'es').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the novel record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the novel record was last updated.

Chapter.title: Chapter
Chapter.description: Represents a single chapter within a novel.

chapterNumber.description: The sequential number of the chapter within the novel.

content.description: The full text content of the chapter.

wordCount.description: The total number of words in the chapter.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the chapter record was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp when the chapter record was last updated.

ReadingProgress.title: ReadingProgress
ReadingProgress.description: Tracks a user's reading progress for a specific novel and chapter.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ReadingProgress entity.

userId.description: Reference to the UserProfile who owns this reading progress.

novelId.description: Reference to the Novel being read.

currentChapterNumber.description: The chapter number the user is currently reading.

lastReadAt.description: Timestamp when the reading progress was last updated.

definition.description: Stores novel metadata. The bookId is typically 'author_title'.
Stores individual chapters. chapterNumber is the document ID.
